CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(BEACON_Portfolio_Created__c)), CASE( Organization_Type__c , "DC-Distributor Customer", "BEACON", "ED-Encompass Program Distributor", "AquaCUE", "FE-Flow End Customer", "AquaCUE", "FM-Skid Manufacturer/OEM", "AquaCUE", "HA-Flow House Account", "AquaCUE", "IR-Flow Industrial/Commercial Rep", "AquaCUE", "OD-Flow Open Distribution", "AquaCUE", "TD-Turf Distributor", "AquaCUE", "UC-Utility Customer", "BEACON", "UD-Utility Distributor", "BEACON", "UO-Utility Other", "BEACON", "WD-WYCO Distributor", "AquaCUE", "WE-WYCO End Customer/Contractor", "AquaCUE", "WM-WYCO OEM", "AquaCUE", ""), "" )
CustomField.label: Software Brand
